card.name: Tata Neu Infinity SBI Card
card.bank: SBI Cards and Payment Services Limited
card.description: A premium co-branded credit card offering rewards in NeuCoins, lounge access, fuel surcharge waiver, and other benefits.
card.target_audience: Individuals seeking premium rewards and benefits with Tata Neu and SBI Card partnership.

categories.name: Tata Neu App/Website and partner Tata Brands
categories.description: 5% value back as NeuCoins on spends
categories.terms_and_conditions: NeuCoins accrual as per updated MID list; excludes balance transfers, cash advances, financial charges, disputed transactions, petrol pumps (except specified MCCs), Merchant EMI, Flexipay, and e-wallet loading transactions.
categories.how_to_earn: Spend on Tata Neu App/Website and partner Tata Brands
categories.validity: NeuCoins posted within 7 working days of statement cycle
categories.exclusions: Balance transfers, cash advances, financial charges, disputed transactions, petrol pumps (MCCs excluded-5172, 5541, 5542, 5983), Merchant EMI, Flexipay, e-wallet loading MCCs 6540 and 6541

categories.name: Select category spends on Tata Neu App/Website
categories.description: Extra 5% value back as NeuCoins on select categories
categories.terms_and_conditions: NeuCoins accrual as per updated MID list; same exclusions as above.
categories.how_to_earn: Spend on select categories on Tata Neu App/Website
categories.validity: NeuCoins posted within 7 working days of statement cycle

categories.name: Other spends including UPI transactions (RuPay Variant)
categories.description: 1.5% value back as NeuCoins; UPI spends capped at 500 NeuCoins per month
categories.terms_and_conditions: Applicable on RuPay variant spends; capped monthly.
categories.how_to_earn: Spend on other merchants including UPI transactions
categories.validity: NeuCoins posted within 7 working days of statement cycle

bonus_rates.condition: Welcome benefit on payment of joining fee
bonus_rates.validity: Within 15 days of realization of joining fee
bonus_rates.terms_and_conditions: NeuCoins credited to Tata NeuPass account

redemption.option: NeuCoins redemption via Tata Neu App/Website and partner brands
redemption.process: NeuCoins automatically transferred to NeuPass account within 7 working days of statement cycle; redeem via Tata Pay or loyalty redemption options on app/website or at partner stores
redemption.terms_and_conditions: Card must not be overdue, suspended, blocked, cancelled or terminated; points not exchangeable for cash or credit; non-transferable

benefits.name: Domestic Airport Lounge Access
benefits.description: 8 complimentary domestic airport lounge visits per year (2 per quarter)
benefits.how_to_avail: Use Tata Neu Infinity SBI Card at participating lounges; eligibility based on minimum spend of Rs. 75,000 in previous calendar quarter
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Spend criteria waived for newly issued cards; only primary cardholders eligible; add-on cardholders pay for access; spend based eligibility applies from 7th day of first month of every quarter

benefits.name: International Airport Lounge Access
benefits.description: 4 complimentary international airport lounge visits per year (1 per quarter) via Priority Pass membership
benefits.how_to_avail: Complimentary Priority Pass membership valid for 2 years; usage fee applies after complimentary visits
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Only primary cardholders eligible; charges apply after 4 visits; membership worth $99

benefits.name: Fuel Surcharge Waiver
benefits.description: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on transactions between Rs. 500 and Rs. 4,000 at petrol pumps across India
benefits.how_to_avail: Use Tata Neu Infinity SBI Card for fuel purchase within specified range
benefits.value: 1% waiver, max Rs. 500 per statement cycle
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Maximum waiver Rs. 500 per statement cycle; excludes GST and other charges

benefits.name: Add-on Cards
benefits.description: Add-on cards available for family members above 18 years
benefits.how_to_avail: Apply for add-on cards for parents, spouse, children, siblings

benefits.name: Cash Withdrawal
benefits.description: Withdraw cash from over 1 million Visa/Mastercard/American Express ATMs worldwide
benefits.how_to_avail: Use Tata Neu Infinity SBI Card at ATMs

benefits.name: Chip and PIN Security
benefits.description: Enhanced security against counterfeiting and skimming with EMV chip and PIN
benefits.how_to_avail: Use chip and PIN enabled card

benefits.name: Flexipay
benefits.description: Convert transactions of Rs. 2,500 or more into easy monthly installments
benefits.how_to_avail: Transact and convert within 30 days via sbicard.com
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Interest charges apply; minimum transaction Rs. 2,500

benefits.name: Balance Transfer on EMI
benefits.description: Transfer outstanding balances from other credit cards to Tata Neu Infinity SBI Card at lower interest rates
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Minimum transfer Rs. 5,000; max 75% of available credit limit; processing fee applies

partnerships.partner: Tata Neu and partner Tata Brands
partnerships.how_to_avail: Spend on Tata Neu App/Website and partner brands
partnerships.terms_and_conditions: NeuCoins accrual as per updated MID list; exclusions apply

partnerships.how_to_avail: Use Tata Neu Infinity SBI Card to access lounges
partnerships.terms_and_conditions: Only primary cardholders eligible; charges apply after 4 visits

fees_and_charges.waiver_conditions: Annual fee reversal on annual spends of Rs. 3 Lakh or more
fees_and_charges.terms_and_conditions: Subject to change at discretion of SBICPSL

fees_and_charges.waiver_conditions: Annual fee reversal on annual spends of Rs. 3 Lakh or more
fees_and_charges.terms_and_conditions: Subject to change at discretion of SBICPSL

fees_and_charges.amount: As per Most Important Terms & Conditions
fees_and_charges.terms_and_conditions: Charged if minimum amount due not paid by due date
